data.title: THE SENTIMENTAL AGENTS IN THE VOLYEN EMPIRE by Lessing, Doris: Soft Cover (1983) 1st Edition.
data.meta_description: 1st Edition. - Soft Cover - London: Jonathan Cape, 1983 - 1983 - 1st Edition. Soft Cover. First Edition. Uncorrected proof copy of Lessing's fifth volume in the Canopus In Argos series, a Swiftian departure for the author. Fine in the publisher's original red wraps, printed in black, as issued, (Canadian journalist's discreet signature o n ffe.). 8vo. 171 pp. - THE SENTIMENTAL AGENTS IN THE VOLYEN EMPIRE

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Shipping From Montreal, Canada & New York, 12914. Orders ship within 3-4 business

days. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book

order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is

required.
